Question: This person prefers teaming with at least one other guitarist and has almost never toured without one.
Hints: This person was inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1993.
In the 1990s and 2000s this person has continued to contribute to a wide range of musical projects as a guest artist.
In August 2007 this person signed a publishing deal for his autobiography, Life, which was released 26 October 2010.
